price: Huenda ukajihiliki nafsi yako kwa ajili yao, kuwasikitikia kwa kuwa hawayaamini mazungumzo haya!
arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Usijihiliki nafsi yako bure kwa kuhuzunika na kusikitika kwa kuacha kwao kuitikia Wito wako, na kuisadiki hii Qur'ani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falaʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka ʿalā āthārihim in lam yu'minū bihādhā al-ḥadīthi asafan
